title: Peugeot Women Swiss Ceramic Crystal Watch with Crystal Bezel
features: Cushion shaped Swarovski-accented silver-tone case with black dial
Silver tone applique, Roman numerals, stick markers with luminous hands
description: A stunning black ceramic watch with silver-tone accents that is sure to stand out in a crowd. Swarovski crystals frame a black dial with silver-tone appliqu√É. Roman numerals are at 12, 3, 6, and 9 on the dial with stick markers at other indices. The bracelet is metal with lovely black ceramic links. The industry leading Swiss movement powers the watch. The silver-tone and black ceramic are a classic pairing that is sure to turn heads!
